name: 碎片时间（Fragment time）
description:
Game introduction
《Fragment time》is a 2D dynamic jigsaw puzzle. Each jigsaw puzzle takes beauty as the theme background. Each picture has different styles and themes, which may be different It's punk style or magic style. One of the many pictures is always suitable for you.Game features
The pictures of each puzzle are displayed dynamically.
Each picture has different difficulty choices and different ranking displays under different difficulties. You can challenge with good friends
Ranking under the same difficulty, brothers come to fight for the fastest one!
